text: Ricardo Joel Gómez Osnaya is a bishop in the Anglican Church of Mexico. He became the fourth bishop of the Diocese of Western Mexico after his consecration on April 13, 2018. He previously served as archdeacon of San Luis Potosí. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Anglican bishops in North America Category:Bishops in Mexico Category:Mexican Anglicans Category:21st-century Anglican bishops Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ricardo Gomez Osnaya
